lexUnit.name: clear.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: show or declare officially to be innocent

sentence.text: Sen. Juan Ponce Enrile , another presidential candidate at the forum , said a Senate inquiry has cleared Ramos of involvement in the land scandal .
Two committees of inquiry cleared Danny Yatom of responsibility for the failed operation against Hamas political leader Khalid Mashaal .
Palestinian Authority officials unequivocally cleared Israel .

Back in November , the 27-year-old left-back was cleared of misconduct when he tested positive for the amphetamine `` speed '' but convinced an FA disciplinary panel that a friend has spiked his drink .
The two Koreans firms have been cited for alleged dumping each year since 1993 but each time have been cleared of the charge .
After the closed-door session , several legislators said the Palestinian Authority acted hastily when it cleared Israel of blame while the investigation was still going on .
Also Tuesday , Hamas leaders stepped up their criticism of the Palestinian Authority , which cleared Israel in the March 29 killing of the group 's chief bombmaker .
1996 - A Spanish Supreme Court judge clears Prime Minister Felipe Gonzalez of involvement in the assassinations of Basque separatists during the 1980s .
MOSCOW ( AP ) --- A Russian government probe has cleared Economics Minister Yakov Urinson of any suspicions of corruption , a government spokesman said Tuesday .
Prosecutors are asking the state 's highest court to reinstate Ms. Woodward 's second-degree murder conviction ; the defense wants her cleared of all charges .
AUCKLAND , New Zealand ( AP ) --- Controversial Northern Bulls prop Johan le Roux was cleared by the Super 12 judiciary Saturday on a charge of stomping on Auckland captain Michael Jones .
The court cleared Novodvorskaya of a separate charge of " insulting the honour and dignity of the USSR President " .
Ray Diamond , foreman of jury in Miami which cleared a man of rape .
Women 's groups have responded angrily to the jury 's decision to clear Austin Donnellan of rape .
Having reluctantly cleared me of the charge of indulging in orgies with my entire sales force , you seem to have got it into your head that Lexy and I are carrying on some kind of affair .
